Plintissa's comm link crackled and she recieved the message! She tried to
reply but all that happened was smoke came from the commlink. She quickly
turned it off and returned to under the rock.

Artist recieved the message's perfect, his systems were fully repaired!
But...he didn't care, he thoguht he was a wolf now, and would not come to
any battle's he didn't want to go to. But THIS battle, he wanted to go to,
there might be some frineds or food there! He panted and stood up, he would
sleep in this new place, maybe it is a pack he could join! Artist ran off,
he was extremely fast, and about 3 hours later, he arived at the point of
Cybertronian Fire! Artist yipped and barked out a hello and rolled on the
ground and stood back up again, it was day at this part of the world (I
assume)...
----- Original Message -----
From: "richard f allen" <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:59 PM
Subject: HELP


> : :Hot Rod: :
>
> Hot Rod decided to call for help. He turned on his comlink, again.
> "To all Maximals who hear this. This is Hot Rod. The Cybertronian Fire
> is still under attack. The Predicons Tankorr, Rampage, Scourge and some
> others are attacking. The one known as DeathScyth, is also somewhere in
> the area. We need enforcements, at the Cybertronian Fire."
